languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, тревожное донесение пришло с добывающих карьеров Веабос-6. Невольники в шахтах помутились рассудком, они хиреют умственно, забывают, как пользоваться инструментами, сбиваются в кучи и даже под ударами плетей продолжают бессмысленно таращиться в пустоту, срывая сроки добычи".

"Lord Captain, a disturbing report has come from the quarries of Vheabos VI. The convicts have lost their minds: they forget how to use tools, they huddle together and continue to stare aimlessly into space, even under the lashes of the whips, ruining the mining deadlines."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, тревожное донесение пришло с добывающих карьеров Веабос-6. Невольники в шахтах помутились рассудком, они хиреют умственно, забывают, как пользоваться инструментами, сбиваются в кучи и даже под ударами плетей продолжают бессмысленно таращиться в пустоту, срывая сроки добычи".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, a disturbing report has come from the mining quarries of Vheabos-VI. The slave labourers have lost their minds: they forget how to use tools, they huddle together and continue to stare pointlessly into the nothingness, even under the lashes of the whips, breaking the mining deadlines."

"Lord Captain, a disturbing report has come from the mining quarries of Vheabos-VI. The slave labourers have lost their minds: they forget how to use tools, they huddle together and continue to stare pointlessly into the nothingness, even under the lashes of the whips, breaking the mining deadlines."

"Lord Captain, a disturbing report has come from the quarries of Vheabos VI. The slave labourers have lost their minds: they forget how to use tools, they huddle together and continue to stare aimlessly into space, even under the lashes of the whips, ruining the mining deadlines."

"Lord Captain, a disturbing report has come from the quarries of Vheabos VI. The slave labourers have lost their minds: they forget how to use tools, they huddle together and continue to stare aimlessly into space, even under the lashes of the whips, ruining the mining deadlines."

"Lord Captain, a disturbing report has come from the quarries of Vheabos VI. The convicts have lost their minds: they forget how to use tools, they huddle together and continue to stare aimlessly into space, even under the lashes of the whips, ruining the mining deadlines."

"Lord Captain, a disturbing report has come from the quarries of Vheabos VI. The convicts have lost their minds: they forget how to use tools, they huddle together and continue to stare aimlessly into space, even under the lashes of the whips, ruining the mining deadlines."

languages.text: “舰长大人，维博斯六号星的矿场传来了令人不安的报告。矿场里的囚犯发了疯，他们忘记了如何使用工具，所有人都挤在一起，茫然地盯着太空，即便是挨了鞭子也毫无反应。由于发生了这样的事故，采矿进度被迫滞后。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, a disturbing report has come from the quarries of Vheabos VI. The convicts have lost their minds: they forget how to use tools, they huddle together and continue to stare aimlessly into space, even under the lashes of the whips, ruining the mining deadlines."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，维博斯六号星的矿场传来了令人不安的报告。矿场里的囚犯发了疯，他们忘记了如何使用工具，所有人都挤在一起，茫然地盯着太空，即便是挨了鞭子也毫无反应。由于发生了这样的事故，采矿进度被迫滞后。”

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, ha llegado un informe inquietante de las canteras de Vheabos VI. Los convictos han perdido la cabeza: olvidan cómo utilizar las herramientas y se agrupan para mirar a la nada, incluso bajo los azotes de los látigos, lo que arruina los niveles de producción».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, a disturbing report has come from the quarries of Vheabos VI. The convicts have lost their minds: they forget how to use tools, they huddle together and continue to stare aimlessly into space, even under the lashes of the whips, ruining the mining deadlines."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, ha llegado un informe inquietante de las canteras de Vheabos VI. Los convictos han perdido la cabeza: olvidan cómo utilizar las herramientas y se agrupan para mirar a la nada, incluso bajo los azotes de los látigos, lo que arruina los niveles de producción».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、ヴィアボス・VIの採石場から不穏な報告が届きました。囚人たちは正気を失っているとのことだ。奴らは道具の使い方を忘れ、身を寄せ合い、鞭で打ち付けられても、ただぼんやりと宇宙を見つめ、採掘の締め切りを破っているそうです」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, a disturbing report has come from the quarries of Vheabos VI. The convicts have lost their minds: they forget how to use tools, they huddle together and continue to stare aimlessly into space, even under the lashes of the whips, ruining the mining deadlines."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、ヴィアボス・VIの採石場から不穏な報告が届きました。奴隷労働者たちは正気を失っているとのことだ。奴らは道具の使い方を忘れ、身を寄せ合い、鞭で打ち付けられても、ただぼんやりと宇宙を見つめ、採掘の締め切りを破っているそうです」
「ロード・キャプテン、ヴィアボス・VIの採石場から不穏な報告が届きました。奴隷労働者たちは正気を失っているとのことだ。奴らは道具の使い方を忘れ、身を寄せ合い、鞭で打ち付けられても、ただぼんやりと宇宙を見つめ、採掘の締め切りを破っているそうです」

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur|Seigneure}-capitaine, nous avons reçu un rapport inquiétant en provenance des carrières de Vhéabos-VI. Il semble que les détenus aient perdu la tête : ils ne savent plus comment utiliser leurs outils, se serrent les uns contre les autres et passent leur temps à regarder en l'air d'un air ahuri malgré les coups de fouet... Nous ne pouvons plus tenir nos délais ! »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, a disturbing report has come from the quarries of Vheabos VI. The convicts have lost their minds: they forget how to use tools, they huddle together and continue to stare aimlessly into space, even under the lashes of the whips, ruining the mining deadlines."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur|Seigneure}-capitaine, nous avons reçu un rapport inquiétant en provenance des carrières de Vhéabos-VI. Il semble que les détenus aient perdu la tête : ils ne savent plus comment utiliser leurs outils, se serrent les uns contre les autres et passent leur temps à regarder en l'air d'un air ahuri malgré les coups de fouet... Nous ne pouvons plus tenir nos délais ! »

languages.text: "Lord Captain, aus den Steinbrüchen von Vheabos-VI erreicht uns ein beunruhigender Bericht. Die Sträflinge haben den Verstand verloren: Sie haben vergessen, wie sie ihre Werkzeuge einsetzen müssen. Sie kauern sich in Gruppen zusammen und starren ziellos in die Leere, selbst wenn sie ausgepeitscht werden. Die Quoten werden deswegen nicht erfüllt."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, a disturbing report has come from the quarries of Vheabos VI. The convicts have lost their minds: they forget how to use tools, they huddle together and continue to stare aimlessly into space, even under the lashes of the whips, ruining the mining deadlines."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, aus den Steinbrüchen von Vheabos-VI erreicht uns ein beunruhigender Bericht. Die Sträflinge haben den Verstand verloren: Sie haben vergessen, wie sie ihre Werkzeuge einsetzen müssen. Sie kauern sich in Gruppen zusammen und starren ziellos in die Leere, selbst wenn sie ausgepeitscht werden. Die Quoten werden deswegen nicht erfüllt."

"Lord Captain, aus den Steinbrüchen von Vheabos-VI erreicht uns ein beunruhigender Bericht. Die Sklavenarbeiter haben den Verstand verloren: Sie haben vergessen, wie sie ihre Werkzeuge einsetzen müssen. Sie kauern sich in Gruppen zusammen und starren ziellos in die Leere, selbst wenn sie ausgepeitscht werden. Die Quoten werden deswegen nicht erfüllt."

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, Vheabos VI'nın ocaklarından nahoş bir rapor aldık. Hükümlüler akıllarını yitirmiş. Alet kullanmayı unutmuşlar, bir kenara yığılıp boş boş etrafa bakıyorlarmış. Kırbaç darbelerine rağmen maden işlerini yetiştiremiyorlarmış."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, a disturbing report has come from the quarries of Vheabos VI. The convicts have lost their minds: they forget how to use tools, they huddle together and continue to stare aimlessly into space, even under the lashes of the whips, ruining the mining deadlines."
